docs.snippet: We sports fans often think that had it not been for the other team’s misbehavior, our team would have won. In soccer, that’s more likely to be true—which makes soccer more difficult to watch with kids.
docs.abstract: We sports fans often think that had it not been for the other team’s misbehavior, our team would have won. In soccer, that’s more likely to be true—which makes soccer more difficult to watch with kids.

headline.main: Watching the World Cup, and Watching Children See Dishonesty Pay Off

docs.snippet: Copa America, 2011: Argentina's Javier Mascherano hands the captain's armband to Lionel Messi after being sent off late in regulation time in the quarterfinal against Uruguay. Argentina loses the ensuing penalty shootout as the host nation is...
docs.lead_paragraph: Copa America, 2011: Argentina's Javier Mascherano hands the captain's armband to Lionel Messi after being sent off late in regulation time in the quarterfinal against Uruguay. Argentina loses the ensuing penalty shootout as the host nation is eliminated from the tournament.

headline.main: Mascherano, Argentina's Captain Without an Armband
headline.print_headline: Mascherano, Argentina's Captain Without an Armband

docs.snippet: Germany faces Brazil on Tuesday, and the Netherlands takes on Argentina on Wednesday, promising a World Cup final four with two classic matchups.
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany faces Brazil on Tuesday, and the Netherlands takes on Argentina on Wednesday, promising a World Cup final four with two classic matchups.
docs.abstract: World Cup's final four has two classic matchups, with European powerhouses taking on equally dynamic teams from South America; preview of semifinal matches between Germany and Brazil, and Netherlands and Argentina.

headline.seo: In Brazil vs. Germany and Argentina vs. Netherlands, Dynamic South American Teams Face European Stalwarts

docs.snippet: Pablo Cuevas of Uruguay won for just the fourth time this year when he ousted sixth-seeded Jeremy Chardy of France 6-2, 6-2 in under an hour in the first round of the Swedish Open on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Pablo Cuevas of Uruguay won for just the fourth time this year when he ousted sixth-seeded Jeremy Chardy of France 6-2, 6-2 in under an hour in the first round of the Swedish Open on Tuesday.

headline.main: Cuevas Knocks Chardy Out of Swedish Open
headline.print_headline: Cuevas Knocks Chardy Out of Swedish Open

docs.snippet: With Neymar out injured, just about everyone in Brazil knew it would be tough against Germany.
docs.lead_paragraph: With Neymar out injured, just about everyone in Brazil knew it would be tough against Germany.

headline.main: Germany Routs Brazil 7-1, Reaches World Cup Final
headline.print_headline: Germany Routs Brazil 7-1, Reaches World Cup Final

docs.snippet: Germany inflicted the most shocking result in World Cup history when they crushed hosts Brazil 7-1 in a semi-final that brought grief to millions of home fans and caused utter astonishment around the world on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany inflicted the most shocking result in World Cup history when they crushed hosts Brazil 7-1 in a semi-final that brought grief to millions of home fans and caused utter astonishment around the world on Tuesday.

headline.main: Sublime Germany Stuns the World With Rout of Brazil
headline.print_headline: Sublime Germany Stuns the World With Rout of Brazil

docs.snippet: It was a humiliating home defeat of record proportions that no Brazilian could have seen coming.
docs.lead_paragraph: It was a humiliating home defeat of record proportions that no Brazilian could have seen coming.

headline.main: Brazil's World Cup Dream Shattered Against Germany
headline.print_headline: Brazil's World Cup Dream Shattered Against Germany

docs.snippet: For many Brazilians, Tuesday's humiliating 7-1 loss to Germany accomplished the unthinkable - a disaster even worse than the last time the country hosted the World Cup, in 1950.
docs.lead_paragraph: For many Brazilians, Tuesday's humiliating 7-1 loss to Germany accomplished the unthinkable - a disaster even worse than the last time the country hosted the World Cup, in 1950.

headline.main: For Brazil Fans, a Debacle Even Worse Than 1950
headline.print_headline: For Brazil Fans, a Debacle Even Worse Than 1950
